Title: Stones of Dornogal
Description:
I am Merrix, Councilward of Dornogal.

I appreciate your aid--especially in light of the fraught nature of your arrival. You must forgive Stormward Baelgrim. Being suspicious is part of his directive. 

A formal discussion of our situation is warranted. If you wish to strike back at the nerubians, as we do, meet us at the Foundation Hall. Baelgrim and I need to review the data so far.

In the meantime, you are my guest. Take my ring. It will allow you to access Dornogal's amenities.
ObjectivesText: Meet with various earthen citizens in Dornogal.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Merrix in Foundation Hall in Dornogal.
CompletionText: The attack seems concentrated on the Coreway. The rest of the city is secure, but we should ready ourselves for anything.
RewardText: Baelgrim's vigilance has kept us safe all these years, but today we need help.

Objectives.Text: Ask a guard about profession trainers
